item.description:
It's Spike the Punch for some Dancing at the Scoreboard (inside the Crown Hotel) in Woburn.

We can meet at one of my favorite places and listen to live band, food is optional. Looking  forward to a fun filled night.Try to come early for good seating Fridays are busy.

You may contact me at 978-857-6626

Band:Spike the Punch

Band plays  9-1

www.spikethepunch.com

Hope to see you there.

There is one request please be responsible for your ***own Tab*** perhaps bring cash pay as you go along..I do not want any open tabs, this is a nice place and have done many events here. Thanking you in advance.

 

We have several "Large Groups Joining in Cross Posted So The Key to Parking and Table Seating is Try To Come Early!! There is a huge parking lot but its also a Hotel combo so keep that in mind. Will be a fun event.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for Eva's table.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Dance to Live Band "Spike The Punch" Friday Night
